name: Jitter Critters
description:
Jitter Critters is a zen bug catching experience. Wander a charming, small, retro-aesthetic environment and nab those bugs for your collection!

Controls:

WASD - Move
Mouse - Look
Left Click - Catch Bugs
P /Escape - Pause
J - Journal

The Team:

Art: Mathew Jenkens

Technical Art: Julian Gatt

Design: Anjali Shibu

Audio: Ryan Boyack

Programming: Heather Cochrane

To play the game:

Press the download button below. Once downloaded open the .zip file by double clicking it. Drag the folder called "JitterCritters1.0" out to your desired location. Open "JitterCritters1.0". And double-click/open "JitterCritters.exe"

Repository link: https://gitlab.com/ghostcatgames/jittercrittes.git
